paper_metadata.title: Financial Linkages, Remittances, and Resource Dependence in East Asia

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: we estimate the models in which the poverty headcount ratio is explained by remittances and certain control variables, namely per capita GDP, financial development (M2 or domestic credit), the inflation rate, trade openness, and education level
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Using unbalanced panel data for 18 Asian countries from 1980 to 2012

evidence_citations.country_citation: Using unbalanced panel data for 18 Asian countries from 1980 to 2012
